replies.body:
there is no "better" champ. as you get better over time you'll learn to play what and how you want in comparison to how you want your game to be, such as winning early and snowballing, roaming a lot to have a better chance of someone else snowballing, play hell safe in lane to win late game, etc. 

a short summary is, renekton is strong in lane, has a dash and a stun and decent bulk/fighting power in mid game but doesnt too well in late game in a lot of games. wukong has no cc and the only match for damage he does compared to renekton is his ult (oh yeah his ult is technically cc) his W allows for decent harass and outplay potential

personally overall unless you're good at the wukong W mind games with your enemies i think renekton can get more done in a game

Wukong is better in most situations I'd say.

Renekton is all about the level 2-3 kills and snowballing.

Wukong is still useful as a full-tank initiator so even if he feeds, he can still not be completely useless.
Are you sure Renekton has an aoe ult plus stun where Wukong has an high aoe that knocks up once which stops if he gets a hard cc.
